activate_vpn_product.description: Message shown to user when extension detects that VPN license has not been activated.
activate_vpn_product.message: Você deve ativar o Avast SecureLine VPN para utilizar este recurso.

activate_vpn_product_avast_one.description: Message shown to user when extension detects that VPN license has not been activated.
activate_vpn_product_avast_one.message: Você deve ativar a VPN do Avast One para utilizar este recurso.

connected.description: Text displayed on main dashboard to show that current VPN state is Connected.

connecting.description: Text displayed on main dashboard to show that current VPN state is Connecting.

connection_failed.description: Text displayed on main dashboard to show that current VPN state is Connection failed.

connection_status_connected_text.description: Text displayed on locations dashboard when the user is connected.

connection_status_connected_title.description: Title displayed on locations dashboard when the user is connected. (Please use short text in the marker html code)

connection_status_disconnected_free_text.description: Text displayed on locations dashboard when the user is on trial and didn't use the 5GB that are for free.
connection_status_disconnected_free_text.message: Ganhe até 5GB de VPN para proteger a sua navegação gratuitamente

connection_status_disconnected_free_titl.description: Title displayed on locations dashboard when the user is on trial and didn't use the 5GB that are for free.  (Please use short text in the marker html code)
connection_status_disconnected_free_titl.message: Proteção potente para a sua navegação

connection_status_disconnected_text.description: Text displayed on locations dashboard when the user is disconnected.
connection_status_disconnected_text.message: Sua conexão não está criptografada e sua localização está visível.

connection_status_disconnected_title.description: Title displayed on locations dashboard when the user is disconnected. (Please use short text in the marker html code)

connection_status_limit_reached_promotio.description: Promotion text displayed on locations dashboard when the user is on trial and has reach the limit. Reason 1
connection_status_limit_reached_promotio.message: Tenha privacidade total com o clique de um botão

connection_status_limit_reached_promotio.description: Promotion text displayed on locations dashboard when the user is on trial and has reach the limit. Reason 2
connection_status_limit_reached_promotio.message: Conexão segura 24 horas com a nossa VPN

connection_status_limit_reached_promotio.description: Promotion text displayed on locations dashboard when the user is on trial and has reach the limit. Reason 3
connection_status_limit_reached_promotio.message: Descubra se as suas senhas foram comprometidas

connection_status_limit_reached_promotio.description: Promotion text displayed on locations dashboard when the user is on trial and has reach the limit.
connection_status_limit_reached_promotio.message: Tenha mais privacidade e segurança em qualquer lugar. Acesse streamings de conteúdos com uma VPN ilimitada. Só na versão Premium!

connection_status_limit_reached_text.description: Text displayed on locations dashboard when the user is on trial and has reach the limit.
connection_status_limit_reached_text.message: Você utilizou todo o volume de dados disponível na sua VPN para esta semana.

connection_status_limit_reached_title.description: Text displayed on locations dashboard when the user is on trial and has reach the limit. (Please use short text in the marker html code)

disconnected.description: Text displayed on main dashboard to show that current VPN state is Disconnected.

disconnecting.description: Text displayed on main dashboard to show that current VPN state is Disconnecting.

dismiss.description: Caption on the button displayed on the error notification view.

extension_icon_overlay_text_connected.description: Extension icon tooltip text in connected state.

extension_icon_overlay_text_connecting.description: Extension icon tooltip text in connecting state.

extension_icon_overlay_text_disconnected.description: Extension icon tooltip text in disconnected state.

extension_icon_overlay_text_disconnectin.description: Extension icon tooltip text in disconnecting state.

extension_icon_overlay_text_reconnecting.description: Extension icon tooltip text in reconnecting state.

fastest_location.description: Text displayed on main dashboard if the user selected the optimal location.

free_data_allowed_day.description: Text after the bar with the free data, displayed in locations dashboard when the user is on trial.

free_data_allowed_month.description: Text after the bar with the free data, displayed in locations dashboard when the user is on trial.

free_data_allowed_week.description: Text after the bar with the free data, displayed in locations dashboard when the user is on trial.

free_data_allowed_year.description: Text after the bar with the free data, displayed in locations dashboard when the user is on trial.

free_data_free.description: Text on top of the bar with the free data displayed in locations dashboard when the user is on trial.

free_data_renew_in.description: Text on top of the bar with the free data, displayed in locations dashboard when the user is on trial.

free_data_used.description: Text after the bar with the free data, displayed in locations dashboard when the user is on trial.

if_that_does_not_work_try_reinstalling_b.description: Message shown to user when extension suggests user to reinstall Secure browser.
if_that_does_not_work_try_reinstalling_b.message: Se isso não funcionar, tente reinstalar o Secure Browser

information.description: Text to show in the tooltip.

install_vpn_product.description: Message shown to user when extension detects that VPN client has not been installed.
install_vpn_product.message: Você precisa instalar o Avast SecureLine VPN mais recente para usar esse recurso.

install_vpn_product_avast_one.description: Message shown to user when extension detects that VPN client has not been installed.
install_vpn_product_avast_one.message: Você precisa instalar a versão mais recente do Avast One para utilizar este recurso

ip_address.description: The real IP of the user. Text to show in the tooltip.

ip_info_connected.description: Text after the selected location when the user is connected.

ip_info_disconnected.description: Text after the selected location when the user is disconnected.
ip_info_disconnected.message: Ative a VPN para criptografar sua navegação

learn_more.description: Text that appears in a tooltip above Info buitton (i) in a dashboard popup.

loading.description: Message shown to user when extension is loading data (upon launch).

locating.description: Text displayed instead of public IP address during fetching it via GeoIp service.

location.description: The location the user is connected to. Text to show in the tooltip.

make_sure_your_internet_connection_works.description: Message shown to user when extension detects that there is no Internet connection.
make_sure_your_internet_connection_works.message: Parece que você está offline, veja se você tem conexão com a internet.

offline.description: Text which is displayed instead of Public IP address when host is offline.

optimal_location.description: Used to prepend name of location which is optimal.

please_try_reinstalling_vpn_product.description: Message shown to user when extension suggests user to reinstall VPN client.
please_try_reinstalling_vpn_product.message: Tente reinstalar o cliente do Avast SecureLine VPN

please_try_reinstalling_vpn_product_avas.description: Message shown to user when extension suggests user to reinstall VPN client.
please_try_reinstalling_vpn_product_avas.message: Tente reinstalar o cliente VPN do Avast One

product_description.message: Criptografe sua conexão de internet em um clique para ter uma verdadeira privacidade online.

product_name.description: Product name which is used for this application.

promotion_button.description: Button for the promotion text displayed on locations dashboard when the user is on trial.

promotion_text.description: Text for the promotion text displayed at the bottom of locations dashboard when the user is on trial and do not reach the limit.
promotion_text.message: Aproveite o máximo de uma VPN e reforce a sua privacidade.

promotion_title.description: Title for the promotion text displayed at the bottom of the on locations dashboard when the user is on trial and do not reach the limit.

reconnecting.description: Text displayed on main dashboard to show that current VPN state is Reconnecting.

see_how.description: Text of the hyperlink with URL of the Help page.

select_location.description: Text displayed on locations dashboard for the user to select a new location.

something_is_not_right.description: Message shown to user when extension detects an error.

something_not_right_please_restart.description: Message shown to user when extension suggests user to restart their computer.
something_not_right_please_restart.message: Ocorreu um erro com o Avast SecureLine VPN. Reinicie seu computador.

something_not_right_please_restart_avast.description: Message shown to user when extension suggests user to restart their computer.
something_not_right_please_restart_avast.message: Há um problema com a VPN do Avast One. Reinicie o seu computador.

this_is_your_current_ip_address.description: Text that appears in a tooltip above current IP address in notification popups.
this_is_your_current_ip_address.message: Esse é seu endereço IP atual.

time_connected.description: The time the user is connected to the VPN. Text to show in the tooltip.

turn_on_vpn_reason.description: Text that appears in the tooltop above the current IP address, in Disconnected state, at the footer of the dashboard popup.
turn_on_vpn_reason.message: Esse é seu endereço IP atual. Os sites podem usá-lo para te identificar. Ative sua VPN para tornar sua conexão privada.

update_browser_product_to_use_this_featu.description: Message shown to user when extension suggests user to update Secure browser.
update_browser_product_to_use_this_featu.message: Você precisa atualizar o Avast Secure Browser para usar esse recurso.

update_now.description: Message shown on the button in a popup suggesting user to update browser or VPN client.

update_vpn_product_to_use_this_feature.description: Message shown to user when extension suggests user to update VPN client.
update_vpn_product_to_use_this_feature.message: Você precisa atualizar o Avast SecureLine VPN para usar esse recurso.

update_vpn_product_to_use_this_feature_a.description: Message shown to user when extension suggests user to update VPN client.
update_vpn_product_to_use_this_feature_a.message: Você precisa atualizar o cliente VPN do Avast One para utilizar este recurso.

virtual_ip.description: The virtual IP. Text to show in the tooltip.

virtual_ip_address.description: Text before the current IP address, in Connected state, at the footer of the dashboard popup.

virtual_ip_address_explanation.description: Text that appears in the tooltop above the current IP address, in Connected state, at the footer of the dashboard popup.
virtual_ip_address_explanation.message: O endereço IP virtual é como outros sites veem você. Isso significa que sua localização real está oculta e seu tráfego está criptografado.

vpn_location.description: Text above the currently selected location in dashboard popup.

waiting_for_ip_address_to_be_assigned_to.description: Text that appears in the tooltop above the 'Locating...' string at the footer of the dashboard popup.
waiting_for_ip_address_to_be_assigned_to.message: Esperando que o endereço IP seja atribuído ao seu computador.

you_need_to_update_your_vpn_product_exte.description: Message shown to user when extension suggests user to update VPN extension.
you_need_to_update_your_vpn_product_exte.message: Você precisa atualizar a extensão Avast VPN.

your_computer_seems_to_be_offline.description: IP Address tooltip text when host is offline.

your_ip_address.description: Text before the current IP address, in Disconnected state, at the footer of the dashboard popup.

your_location_connected.description: Text displayed on main dashboard on top of the selected location when the user is connected.
your_location_connected.message: Agora a sua localização aparece para outros como:

your_location_disconnected.description: Text displayed on main dashboard on top of the selected location when the user is disconnected.
